content: revel in the silky softness of this knit throw that offers the best of 2 worlds with its motif-based join-as-you-go construction designed in bernat velvet colors are organized in an abstract digital pattern for a sophisticated and modern style that will quickly warm up your space you ll love watching each mitered square fly off your needles - and there s no seaming once you ve finished it s an entertaining pattern that lets you practice pick up and knit center decrease knit knit 2 together decrease pass slipped stitch over decrease and working back and forth in row techniques enjoy it as designed or customize your blanket for a winning gift
